name: Tank 2D
description:
PANZER TANK is a tactical game goalkeeper. Players must destroy the enemy tank, and protect the treasure in a safe. If the shot fragile treasures destroyed, the player will lose and have to start again from the first level.
When destroying enemy that contains items, players control their character to pick items that increased combativeness. These items are included in the game such as: increasing strength of artillery, armor protection, buying items and upgrading the Stronghold with stone surround and a series of bombs. Players can also buy items in the shop with money earned from killing each enemy tank.
With the challenge of difficulty increases requiring players to choose appropriate tactics to overcome every level, go to the winning destination.
Are you ready with Panzer Tank?
publishers: IDTV  Viet  Nam Development Technology And Trading Investment Joint Stock Company
